com.game.characters.spells

Class AbstractSpell

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.game.characters.spells.AbstractSpell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpellCommand, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArmageddonAndThenSome, BuffHealth, BuffIntelligence, BuffMagic, BuffSpeed, BuffStrength, Defend, FlameThrower, Fly, GoodDrugs, GreatDrugs, IFeelMuchBetterNow, Open, Zorch, Zot

    public abstract class AbstractSpell
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, SpellCommand
    A dummy spell, used to register a player's ability to cast a particular spell
    Author:
    tberge01
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      returns the integer range of the spell or -1 if it has no specified range

      Returns an immutable set of the spell requirements for this DummySpell
      abstract AbstractSpell newInstance()
      Returns a new instance of the AbstractSpell to give to another character
